A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I created an account for the sole purpose of giving a review of this “poo doo.” I really liked TFA and R1\, so I’m not trying to be a hater\, but Wow... this movie is not good. It’s better than E1 and maybe E2\, and that’s about it. I won’t give details because I don’t want to give spoilers. SW fans like me are going to see the movie regardless of the reviews. I’m just very\, very disappointed. Every line of dialogue is rehashed\, the plot is pointless\, there’s a side plot that takes 30 minutes that could have been totally cut and nothing would have changed\, everything felt very E1 (less Jar Jar). I kept waiting for a character to shout\, “This is podracing!”
